profile:
Hello!

I have 20yrs experience installing and finishing drywall. Hand finishing. I do metal framing, drywall installation, taping and finishing, plaster mouldings installation and repair. Textures. I work on custom homes and additions.  

I work in the Georgian Triangle, as well as Creemore,  Medford, Moonstone, Tiny. 

Please give me a call at 705-446-8901. I look forward to working with you!
